The purpose of employment equity is to achieve equality in the workplace and to correct the disadvantages experienced by various groups. If you would like to identify as being a part of an equity-seeking group not listed above, or if the options above do not accurately reflect your identity, you may self-identify using the open text box below. Otherwise, press the Next button to go to the next question.table 1 note*
